ygData.subject: Re: Finally...
ygData.msgSnippet: Every Gnome starts with a skill of 50, even al level 1, but you can t start improving it until level 16.  From what I ve heard on this list, it seems that even
ygData.messageBody:
Every Gnome starts with a skill of 50, even al level 1, but you can't start
improving it until level 16. From what I've heard on this list, it seems
that even after that there are level caps. Probably a hold over from the
beta days that someone had mentioned earlier.

Tinik
Veeshan

----- Original Message -----
From: <Diablokilr@...>
To: <EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, October 19, 1999 12:39 PM
Subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] Finally...


> From: Diablokilr@...
>
> I made a whole lot of poles at lvl 13 I could not make the spyglass one
> person I know bombed out 3 times had skill lvl 50. I dont know what my
skill
> is I've never seen it go up but the poles were trivial to me.
